Dm_ZN_0022_Text_011_b: The path will be very dangerous.
Dm_ZN_0022_Text_012_b:
Fortunately, this construct body you have
built for me is hardly helpless.
Dm_ZN_0022_Text_013_b:
There is a platform nearby where we can
explore its potential.
Dm_ZN_0022_Text_014_b:
Now hurry, Link. We must recover my
secret stone.
Dm_ZN_0022_Text_008_b: We must recover my secret stone.
Dm_ZN_0022_Text_009_b:
It should be located here. Please, Linkâ€”
let us go there together.
